DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective SONOMA Registry confirm safety NexStent® Carotid Stent System FilterWire EZ™ Embolic Protection System routine clinical practice identify rare unanticipated device-related event might occur .
DOC.brief_title: Post-Approval Study NexStent Carotid Stent System FilterWire EZ Embolic Protection System : SONOMA

DOC.criteria: Candidates must indicate carotid stent placement per NexStent Carotid Stent label locate Directions Use ( DFU ) . Subjects contraindication outline DFU exclude registry .
